job_description: TRIUMFCanada's National Laboratory for Particle and Nuclear Physics STUDENT JOB PROGRAM Summer 2015 job posting Job number TR15-2-9Student job title:     PET target research assistantName of project:     PET target developmentOverview:     The smallest cyclotron at TRIUMF produces medical PET isotopes which     are used by the BC Cancer Agency and the Parkinson Research Center in     the diagnosis of patients and to better understand the disease. We also are interested in new ways of producing     established isotopes and exploring the production of new isotopes.      Duties:     The successful candidate will assist in target research, including     commissioning, testing and characterizing of a prototype of a new     target design.
